TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPageTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

summary.span: 提供一个将 消息定向到 ASP.NET 网页输出的侦听器。

span.span: Provides a listener that directs messages to ASP.NET Web page outputs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 应用于此类的特性具有以下 属性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅 类或 [SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](/dotnet/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](/dotnet/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes). 类将写入日志的跟踪消息转发 到 ASP.NET 网页输出通道。The class forwards trace messages that are written to the log to ASP.NET Web page output channels. 可以通过将 对象添加到 Web.config 文件，将其作为侦听器添加到 ") ASP.NET" 部分的[ < > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element) [trace 元素 (](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6915t83k(v=vs.100))You can enable trace forwarding by adding a object to your Web.config file as a listener in the [trace Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6915t83k(v=vs.100)) subsection of the [<system.diagnostics>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element) section. 还可以 通过编程方式将添加到侦听器集合。You can also add a to the listeners collection programmatically. 通常，在 应用程序启动过程中使用 global.asax 文件中的方法将添加到集合 `Application_Start` 。Commonly, this is done by adding a to the collection during application startup, using the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 消息路由到 Web 窗体输出。The following code example demonstrates how to route messages to Web form output. 此代码示例演示了一个包含和控件的典型 Web 窗体 。The code example shows a typical Web form containing a and control. 在 Web 窗体上启用跟踪后，在呈现 Web 窗体时，跟踪输出将追加到 Web 窗体上。Tracing is enabled on the Web form and trace output is appended to the Web form when it is rendered. 您可以检查跟踪输出的 **跟踪信息** 表中的跟踪消息。You can examine the trace messages in the **Trace Information** table of the trace output. 如果已 在配置文件中正确地启用了，则会看到具有该类别的跟踪消息 `"Trace Test"` 。If you have enabled the correctly in your configuration file, you see both trace messages with the category `"Trace Test"`. 但是，如果尚未启用 ，则只会看到写入对象的跟踪消息 。However, if you have not enabled the , you see only the trace message that is written to the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_2/CS/form2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_2/VB/form2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 使用指定的系统数据和事件数据将事件消息写入网页或写入 ASP.NET 跟踪查看器。

span.span: Writes an event message to a Web page or to the ASP.NET trace viewer using the specified system and event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 使用 `source` 作为类别和消息将事件消息写入对象 `message` 。The method writes the event message to the object using `source` as the category and `message` as the message.

summary.span: 使用指定的系统数据和事件数据将本地化的事件消息写入网页或 ASP.NET 跟踪查看器。

span.span: Writes a localized event message to a Web page or to the ASP.NET trace viewer using the specified system and event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 方法，传递 `format` 和 `args` ，并使用 属性将字符串格式化为要写入跟踪查看器或网页的消息。The method calls the method, passing `format` and `args` and using the property to format the string as the message to write to the trace viewer or Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使在配置文件中启用了该方法，该方法也不会写入对象输出。The method does not write to the object output, even if it is enabled in the configuration file.
